timeline.bodyText: You have copied this REPL twice in your program, but only the second copy contains an error. That means that you use the same 1 diagnostic tag in two places. I expect that the test fails, but it is not.
timeline.author: grianbrcom

replies.bodyText: A-ha! I got it—the error related to copybook, not extended document. Now I see that it's OK.
replies.author: grianbrcom

replies.bodyText: Yes, that's correct. The reason why I changed this test was just that we are going to support a lot of new semantic features, so most likely the number of errors, as well as their messages, will change frequently. Here I just check that the different copy statements represent different copybook entries, so the test semantic remains the same after the changes.
replies.author: temanbrcom
